adjectives.description: flawed (comparative more flawed, superlative most flawed)

examples: Antonyms: perfect, flawless; see also Thesaurus:flawless
Flawed diamonds are generally not used in jewellery.
His design for a perpetual motion machine is flawed because water does not flow uphill.
